list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor ToastService for cross-platform compatibility
Replaced Windows-specific notification code in ToastService with a console output placeholder. This change simplifies the current notification system and prepares for future implementation of a multi-platform solution. Additionally, removed unused package reference and adjusted project configuration files for improved development workflow.

task.summary:
Remove assemblyinfo.cs and add JetBrains IDE configuration files
The assemblyinfo.cs file was removed because it is no longer necessary for the project configuration. New configuration files for JetBrains IDEs were added to improve project setup and workflow consistency. The .gitignore was updated to exclude user-specific and generated files for better version control management.

Refactor ToastService for cross-platform compatibility
Replaced Windows-specific notification code in ToastService with a console output placeholder. This change simplifies the current notification system and prepares for future implementation of a multi-platform solution. Additionally, removed unused package reference and adjusted project configuration files for improved development workflow.
